long_description: Offering a stable, durable platform at a great value, the Emotion Kayaks Temptation(TM) Sit-On-Top kayak offers recreational paddlers more warm-weather fun than you can shake a paddle at. 11 ft. length offers enhanced performance with a streamlined feel; the Temptation will amaze you with its easy-to-paddle design. Specially compounded polyethylene hull resists abrasion and UV light, and specialized blowmolding process produces a strong hull of consistent quality. Seat back increases support and folds down when storing the boat, and molded-in footwells offer supportive bracing for paddlers of different heights. 10 in. front hatch stashes small items out of direct splashes, and roomy interior offers plenty of room for day tripping items such as lunch or an extra layer. Aft storage tank well with bungee rigging and cargo netting secures your gear; cargo netting works well with bulky items such as an extra paddling jacket or PFD. Multiple carry handles and built-in skeg wheel makes transport to the water easy. Weighs approx. 49 lbs.
short_description: Offering a stable, durable platform at a great value, the Emotion Kayaks Temptation(TM) Sit-On-Top kayak offers recreational paddlers more warm-weather fun than you can shake a paddle at.
